meanings.definition: (文学)アムプリュソス川の、またはアムプリュソス川に由来する
meanings.english_definition: (literary) Of or pertaining to the Amphrysus river, or derived from it.

etymology.value: From the name of the river Amphrysus in Thessaly, Greece.

usage_notes.explanation: Rare word, mainly found in literary contexts referring to classical mythology or geography.

readability_explanation.text: This word is highly specialized and rarely used outside of literary contexts related to classical mythology or geography. Its understanding requires familiarity with ancient Greek references.
